name: Knitting: The Stim Game
description:
Knitting: The Stim Game is a game made by a neurodivergent person for neurodivergent people.  

For those who don't know, stimming is a series of repeated actions that has a positive effect on various people, especially those with ASD and/or ADHD. 

This game is that.

It provides patterned keyboard prompts to repeat, with handedness options for optimal enjoyment regardless of handedness (I'm a lefty!).

This game is being made for OpenGameArt.Org's Fall Game Jam 2021 and features assets from OpenGameArt.org, plus art from Julia Graziano.
